title: The Art of Political Lying - primary function

content.question: The primary function of the second paragraph is to

choices.label: contradict the position taken in the first paragraph
reveal the error in a particular belief
examine the purpose of a cherished ideal
parody the way in which liars exploit rhetoric for their own purposes

content.answer: reveal the error in a particular belief

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Describe the line of reasoning and explain whether it supports an argument's overarching thesis.
